Package moteur

Class Offer

  • java.lang.Object
    • moteur.Offer
  • public class Offer
extends java.lang.Object
    The class Offer is an agregation of cards, more specifically, is made up of CardsAJouer. Offer is a set of cards in front of the player. On your turn the player must choose one card to turn faceUp, by calling the methode public void chooseOneFaceup(int index) throws InvalidNumberException.

    This class has 4 methodes, which ensure the basic operations. With an ArrayList named cards, the elements are of type of CardsAJouer, which correspondes the real situation. The methodes of class can get the number of rest cards, can get the whole ensemble of the stack.

      Constructor, initialize the cards.

    • Method Detail

      • addCardOffer

        public void addCardOffer​(CardsAJouer card)
        This methode can add a card, being the parameter tranferred in, and add it to the Array List cards
        Parameters:
        card - the card to add in, given by the GameContoller

      • deleteCardOffer

        public void deleteCardOffer​(int index)
        This methode can delete certain card, by indicating the index(parm). When another player takes the card of current player, who shall be the owner of this cards, the card will be taken, and correspondly, the card should be deleted, in this case, this methode deleteCardOffer will be called.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the card to be deleted, can be relaized by both using the commande line or graphic interface.

      • getOfferByIndex

        public CardsAJouer getOfferByIndex​(int index)
        By calling this methode, we can get card by entering the index of the card, which should be 0 or 1.
        Parameters:
        index - the index
        Returns:
        CardsAJouer the card

      • setIsComplet

        public void setIsComplet​(boolean reponse)
        setter

        In a single turn, only if the Offer is completed when another player shall have the right to choose, which is to say, the size of the ArrayList cards should be 2.

        Parameters:
        reponse - true if the Offer is complet.

      • getIsComplet

        public boolean getIsComplet()
        getter

        In a single turn, only if the Offer is completed when another player shall have the right to choose, which is to say, the size of the ArrayList cards should be 2.

        Returns:
        boolean
